name: Kosezi
uniques: Can build Farms, and upon constructing one the Great People generation rate of the nearest owned City permanently increases by 3% (max 30%). +50% Defense when stationing on a Farm.

civilopediaText.text: The principality of Carantania is particularly notable for the ancient ritual of installing Carantanian dukes (or princes, both an approximate translation of Knez/Knyaz/FÃ¼rst), a practice that continued after Carantania was incorporated into the later Duchy of Carinthia. -Wikipedia-
